[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@esengine/ecs-framework](./ecs-framework.md) &gt; [Matcher](./ecs-framework.matcher.md)

## Matcher class

实体匹配条件描述符

用于描述实体查询条件，不执行实际查询

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Matcher 
```

## Example


```typescript
const matcher = Matcher.all(Position, Velocity)
  .any(Health, Shield)
  .none(Dead);

// 获取查询条件
const condition = matcher.getCondition();
```
